content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mldewkpstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/arcinsights/10291---ResumeParsing_10291---10291_LambdaSubscriber.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

Create Database devops
Go

alter database devops
       COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;

CREATE VIEW devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView AS
SELECT *, a.filename() as [Filename]
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'https://mldewkpstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/arcinsights/10291---ResumeParsing_10291---10291_LambdaSubscriber.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)
WITH(
    [AirID] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[ComponentName] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Version] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Platform] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[BUILD_BUILDNUMBER] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_Name] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[BuilderMeta_DateTime] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_Version] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_SourceType] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_Source] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[type] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[CollectionSource] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dev] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[BUILD_REPOSITORY_URI] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Build_ID] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Build_Repository_Name] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_MACHINENAME] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_OS] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_OSARCHITECTURE] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_NAME] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,BUILD_SOURCEBRANCHNAME VARCHAR(1000)
)
AS [a];
GO

select * from devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView;


Drop view devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView1;

CREATE VIEW devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView1 AS
SELECT *, a.filename() as [Filename], CONVERT(nvarchar(30), a.BuilderMeta_DateTime, 126) AS [BuilderMeta_DateTimeISO]
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'https://mldewkpstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/arcinsights/10291---ResumeParsing_10291---10291_LambdaSubscriber.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)
WITH(
    [AirID] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[ComponentName] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Version] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Platform] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[BUILD_BUILDNUMBER] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_Name] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[BuilderMeta_DateTime] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_Version] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_SourceType] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dependencies_Source] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[type] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[CollectionSource] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Dev] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[BUILD_REPOSITORY_URI] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Build_ID] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[Build_Repository_Name] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_MACHINENAME] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_OS] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_OSARCHITECTURE] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,[AGENT_NAME] VARCHAR(8000)
      ,BUILD_SOURCEBRANCHNAME VARCHAR(1000)
)
AS [a];
GO

Select * from devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView1;

select AirID, ComponentName, Platform, BuilderMeta_DateTime, CONVERT(nvarchar(30), BuilderMeta_DateTime, 126) AS UsingConvertTo_ISO8601 from devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView1;

describe devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView1;

select year([BuilderMeta_DateTimeISO]) as year
, MONTH([BuilderMeta_DateTimeISO]) as month
, DAY([BuilderMeta_DateTimeISO]) as day 
from devOpsApplicationDevLibrariesView1;
